channel.title: Help [PI]
channel.description:
Can someone give me a code for custom teleports? Like.. On PI on ONE teleport you have like 5 options, all the rest you click and it teles you somewhere.. How can you do it to where one teleport gives multi options?
AND where do I change SHOP PRICES?

item.title: Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Alright, I found a source that has the teleports I want. It’s Project Insanity too, so how/where do I find them?

Read full topic

item.title: Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“ApocalypseX, post:1, topic:396960”]Can someone give me a code for custom teleports?
Like… On PI on ONE teleport you have like 5 options, all the rest you click and it teles you somewhere… How can you do it to where one teleport gives multi options?

AND where do I change SHOP PRICES?[/quote]

The “custom teleports” are really just a chatbox interface that has multiple options. So all you would need to do is when the object(portal) is clicked, show the chatbox interface with however many options you want (2-5 because if there’s only one option, there’s no need for the extra step), and when the player clicks the options have them be teleported.

Read full topic

item.title: Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Epicmaul Epicmaul
item.description:
@Epicmaul wrote:

Shop prices are located in the Data>Cfg>prices.txt
Find your item id and change the price
ex.
11694 10000

10000 is the price.
and 11694 is the item id.

Read full topic
